alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 10:12PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Gosper and northern Furnas Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1012 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Stockville, or 16 miles east of Curtis, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holbrook, Arapahoe, Edison and Hollinger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
